title: Amazon’s Grocery-Store Plan Moves Ahead With Los Angeles Leases
text:
Amazon.com Inc. is advancing a plan to open a chain of U.S. grocery stores with early outposts in Los Angeles, Chicago and Philadelphia, according to people familiar with the matter.

In the Los Angeles area, it has signed more than a dozen leases, the people said. The first few stores are likely to be in the dense suburban locations of Woodland Hills and Studio City, while another grocer is slated for the city of Irvine, in nearby Orange County, a person familiar with the matter said. These stores could open as early as the...
description: Amazon.com is pushing ahead with a plan to open a chain of U.S. grocery stores with early outposts in Los Angeles, Chicago and Philadelphia.
